thread.title: Manchester City return to top after dull derby draw - World
thread.title_full: Manchester City return to top after dull derby draw - World - Sports - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Manchester City return to top after dull derby draw - World
text:
Related Kane scores hat-trick as Spurs thrash Bournemouth Sunderland off bottom of Premier League with derby win Manchester City returned to the top of the Premier League by drawing 0-0 away to Manchester United in a disappointing local derby on Sunday.
They have 22 points, the same as Arsenal, but a better goal difference.
United stay fourth, two points behind, with West Ham United also above them. They came closest to a goal when substitute Jesse Lingard hit the bar six minutes from the end.
City had won six of the previous eight league derbies, but like the home side found chances hard to come by this time.
